titles.title: To direct the Director of the National Science Foundation to support multidisciplinary research on the science of suicide, and to advance the knowledge and understanding of issues that may be associated with several aspects of suicide including intrinsic and extrinsic factors related to areas such as wellbeing, resilience, and vulnerability.
Advancing Research to Prevent Suicide Act
Advancing Research to Prevent Suicide Act
Advancing Research to Prevent Suicide Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.
